title: Account Transfers
body: so recently Ive moved to Germany....Ive been playing this game since season 2....so I really dont wanna create a new acc in another server just to play and lvl it up and all that.....currently I play with 150/300 ping and its kinda.....toxic for me....so please...can you just clarify whats the situation with the acc transfers?

replies.body: They should be up soon(TM), hopefully within the next 3-4 weeks at the *absolute* latest. Thatâ€™s based on their current predictions, however, and things may change that make it happen sooner or later.
